website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, effective two-tier bamboo steamer that's small enough to fit inside pots and pans.
pros: Includes 50 parchment-like liners, 2 sets of chopsticks
cons: Lid fit may be a bit difficult
Mildew growth could occur if steamer isn't allowed to air dry properly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bamboo Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I've steamed dumpling a few times so far, and they were delicious. The first time I used the included Liners, and it was pretty disastrous. The wrappers stuck to the dumplings and the only way to get them off was to mutilate my cute dumplings. The second time I used cabbage leaves instead of the Liners and the dumplings turned out perfect. I've used only cabbage leaves since then. Also, some reviewers mentioned that the Steamer imparts a weird taste to their food. Neither me nor the people I served the food to have noticed anything.
customer_reviews.author: Murve

customer_reviews.title: Worked excellent with my existing wok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this steamer to make hum bao which I had not made in years. The steamer worked perfect with my existing wok I just simmered water in the bottom of the wok then set the steamer on top. I am looking forward to using the steamer for pot stickers which is one of my favorite appetizers and prefer the chewiness you get from steaming vs frying.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine I. WrightTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Handy small steamer
customer_reviews.text: Two layers, comes with cheese cloth, well made and small enough to fit in Western pans, even though I've got a Wok, it's easier to just use a small pot or pan to make steam.
customer_reviews.author: munch Scully

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we ordered, it came with steamer paper too.

customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, great quality! I was pleasantly surprised! Gave as a gift. The recipient was just as happy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Good size. Sturdy and we'll-made. Steam liners and chopsticks were a welcome addition. Good value

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is exactly as described and very sturdy. You will be happy with this purchase, though I recommend to invest in the silicone liners.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This steamer looks good and works as advertised. The additional chip sticks are the usual cheap wooden ones you get for free from the local take out.

customer_reviews.title: Food smells bad after using this product
customer_reviews.text: An unpleasantly strange smell from this steamer especially for the first few uses, ruined my dumplings. I wouldn't recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: sccoolshow

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything included as promised. The chopsticks are a bit chintzy but the liners are there and the baskets are made in the traditional manner. I like it.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: It is easiest to use if you have a wok, and the liners are great.

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: The Flexzion Bamboo Steamer Basket Set met my expectations. I thought the trays would be a bit deeper, but even so it is fine and I do enjoy using it for all my steaming needs.

customer_reviews.title: nice bamboo steamer set
customer_reviews.text: nice bamboo steamer set. liners are a big plus! always need another set or two of chop sticks. can't beat this set for the price. thanks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product thanks
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect now I need a few more so I can stack them higher awesome product

customer_reviews.title: Best Value, especially with bonus lines and chopsticks.
customer_reviews.text: You can put just about anything in a dumpling wrapper and get delicious results. My favorite dumplings are steamed, not boiled or fried and this steamer does the job. The liners are a great bonus - 50 of them! It saves the step of buying cabbage or cutting parchment paper to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelker

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Fits perfectly in my instant pot and also great to use stovetop. Non-stick liners didn’t work, but, who cares? Affordable and decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.H.

product_meta.title: Flexzion Bamboo Steamer Basket Set (10 inch) with 50x Steamer Liners and 2 Pairs of Chopsticks, Chinese Steamer for Cooking Food
feature_bullets: Stackable 2 tiered steamer baskets made of woven bamboo; the bamboo wood steamer is sturdy and water resistant
Designed for use inside a wok or over a stockpot; Measures 10 inches in diameter
Domed lid retains moisture, nutrients, colour and flavour
Leverages steam cooking for vegetables, rice, fish, dim sum
Ideal for creating authentic asian Chinese cuisine at home
